type_one.description:
Property type (main).
See [Get property types](/api/lookups#available-property-types) for the list of available property types.

type_two.description:
Property type (secondary).
See [Get property types](/api/lookups#available-property-types) for the list of available property types.

country.description: See [Get Countries](/api/lookups#available-countries) for the list of available countries

region.description: See [Get Regions](/api/lookups#available-regions) for the list of available regions

province.description: See [Get Provinces](/api/lookups#available-provinces) for the list of available provinces

city.description: See [Get Cities](/api/lookups#available-cities) for the list of available cities

idu_cru.description: unique, 14-digit codes that identify a specific property within Spain's Land Registry (provide only when country is spain)

finca_number.description: official unique registration number assigned to a property (provide only when country is spain)
